title: Force on proton in magnetic field

content.question: A proton moving to the right in the plane of the page with speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> enters a magnetic field of magnitude <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> directed toward the top of the page. What is the direction of the initial magnetic force that is exerted on the proton?

choices.label: Toward the top of the page
No direction, because there is no magnetic force on the proton
